parameters.angle: anglelerp(Self.Bullet.AngleOfMotion, angle(Self.X, Self.Y, Self.targetX, Self.targetY), 3 * dt)

parameters.value: random(clamp(minInterval - log10(score-scoreOffset + 1), 0, minInterval), clamp(maxInterval- log10(score-scoreOffset + 1), 1, maxInterval))

parameters.text: type = "desktop" ? "Left click to jump" : "Tap to jump"
